front.title: I2NSF Application Interface YANG Data Model

author.organization: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering
Department of Computer Science and Engineering

abstract.t: This document describes an information model and a YANG data model for the Application Interface between an Interface to Network Security Functions (I2NSF) Analyzer and Security Controller in an I2NSF system in a Network Functions Virtualization (NFV) environment. The information model and YANG data model is based on the I2NSF Consumer-Facing Interface for enabling feedback delivery based on the information received from the Network Security Function (NSF).
